state_analysis: The import_transactions.sql file has 100 lines (one INSERT per transaction), but only 21 transactions are in the database. The import seems to have failed or stopped early. I need to re-run the import to get all 100 transactions into the database.
explanation: Re-import the transactions by running the SQL file again. Then regenerate the database statistics and top users reports with the complete data.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;'"
